title: Global Money: Multi-currency Wallets

sections.title: The Digital Wallet
sections.content:
Modern apps allow you to hold many currencies at once. 

- **Multi-currency Wallet**: One app with different 'pots' for Euro, Dollar, and Pound.
- **Real-time Rate**: The exact value of a currency at this second.
- **Conversion**: Changing one currency into another inside the app.
- **Transparent Fees**: Knowing exactly how much the app charges (no hidden costs).

sections.title: Digital Conversion Flow
sections.content:
```mermaid
graph LR
    A[Select EUR Pot] --> B[Click Convert]
    B --> C[Choose USD]
    C --> D[Check Live Rate]
    D --> E[Enter Amount]
    E --> F[Confirm & Swap]
```

sections.title: Grammar: How much vs. How many
sections.content:
We use different questions for different types of money.

- **How much**: Use for 'Money' (uncountable) or prices.
  - *How much money is in your wallet?*
  - *How much is the fee?*
- **How many**: Use for specific currencies or coins (countable).
  - *How many Dollars do you want?*
  - *How many Euros do I have left?*

**Rule**: Money = much. Dollars/Euros/Pounds = many.

sections.title: Spending Abroad
sections.content:
When you travel, your app handles the exchange automatically.

- **Base Currency**: Your main currency (e.g., Euro).
- **Target Currency**: The currency you need (e.g., Yen).
- **Markup**: An extra cost some banks add to the rate (try to avoid this!).
